tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE PremiumPayments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, policy_id INT, payment_amount DECIMAL, payment_date DATE, payment_method VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE PolicyRenewals (renewal_id INT PRIMARY KEY, policy_id INT, renewal_date DATE, renewed_by VARCHAR, renewal_amount DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE Policies (policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, policy_holder VARCHAR, policy_type VARCHAR, policy_amount DECIMAL, policy_start_date DATE, policy_end_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE PolicyRenewals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT NOT NULL,
    renewal_date DATE NOT NULL,
    premium_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    renewal_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Policies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    policy_holder VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    policy_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    policy_end_date DATE NOT NULL
);
